text: Sredi tekh, komu My nisposlali Toru i Yevangeliye, yest' lyudi, kotoryye s dostoynym vnimaniyem otnosyatsya k istinam, izlozhennym v etikh Pisaniyakh, zamechayut iskazheniya, veruyut lish' tol'ko v istinu nisposlannogo im Pisaniya i, sledovatel'no, veruyut v Koran. Kto ne veruyet v Pisaniye, nisposlannoye Allakhom, ponesot bol'shoy uron
